bibl.title: Creating Christian Nubia: Processes and Events on the Egyptian Frontier.
bibl.note: Introduction. - From Meroites to Nubians? - 'Ethnic' explanations: Cultural and political changes on the frontier? - Post-Meroitic transitions in the North. - Towards a Christian Noubadia. - Conclusion: Processes and events on the 'Nubian' frontier.

bibl.title: Inside and Out. Interactions between Rome and the Peoples on the Arabian and Egyptian Frontiers in Late Antiquity

bibl.seg: David N. Edwards, Creating Christian Nubia: Processes and Events on the Egyptian Frontier.

Jitse H.F. Dijkstra & Greg Fisher (edd.), Inside and Out. Interactions between Rome and the Peoples on the Arabian and Egyptian Frontiers in Late Antiquity = Late Antique History and Religion. 8 (Leuven, 2014) pp. 407-431.

Introduction. - From Meroites to Nubians? - 'Ethnic' explanations: Cultural and political changes on the frontier? - Post-Meroitic transitions in the North. - Towards a Christian Noubadia. - Conclusion: Processes and events on the 'Nubian' frontier.
